channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Complaints Rise as Taiwan's Child Protection Law Hits One-Year Mark
item.description: Taiwan's child care professionals have seen a sharp increase in formal complaints made against them since new child protection laws came into force one year ago.

item.title: Hualien Unable To Process Trash After Quake Damages Roads and Incinerator
item.description: The magnitude 7.2 earthquake that hit Hualien on April 3 has paralyzed traffic and refuse incineration in the region, leading to trash piling up in the county on Taiwan's eastern c

item.title: Israel and Taiwan Have Much in Common, Says Visiting Delegation
item.description: A visiting delegation from Israel's Knesset or parliament says Taiwan was one of the first countries to stand with them following the Hamas attack on October 7 last year and again
